comments.creator: jduell.mcbugs@gmail.com
comments.author: jduell.mcbugs@gmail.com
comments.text:
Comment on attachment 544641
imported patch mozfiledata

> Jason, how does exporting nsSimpleURI from netwerk/ sound to you?

Sounds fine to me.  But I suspect bz might know if there's some objection (bz: the issue is just the one-line export change in the makefile).
comments.raw_text:
> Jason, how does exporting nsSimpleURI from netwerk/ sound to you?

Sounds fine to me.  But I suspect bz might know if there's some objection (bz: the issue is just the one-line export change in the makefile).

Why do we need to export it?  Seems like all you really need is to netwerk/base/src it to LOCAL_INCLUDES as needed.

We really don't want stuff outside Gecko to start depending on nsSimpleURI....
